VulnerabilityDesc.Description: Deposits don't work with fee-on transfer tokens
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Measure the asset change right before and after the asset-transferring routines

VulnerabilityDesc.Type: Sending tokens to the wrong user
VulnerabilityDesc.Description: uncommit sends tokens to the wrong user
The computation mixes WADs and Quads which leads to issues. The keeper rewards are off as the _keeperGas * _tipPercent is divided by 1e18 instead of 1e2.
VulnerabilityDesc.Repair: Make keeperTip() return a byte16 Quad value as a percentage where 100% = ABDKMathQuad.fromUInt(1) or divide by 100 as a quad instead of 1e18 as a quad because _tipPercent is not a WAD value, but simply a percentage where 1 = 1%
